reviewText: like i said, anything perry mason is great.
Not as good as his other episodes.
Would recommend this to Perry Mason fans.
What's not to like about Raymond Burr's Perry Mason, or his co-stars in this story.  The fact that this series presents double features with each purchase doubles the value as well as the pleasure.
I especially like this set because The Case of the Killer Kiss was the last movie he made! I'm trying to collect all of them!
great to finally have them all
Great!! Came right on time!! Like the old shows!
